1)  Char  Dham  Yatra  –  9  Nights  /  10  Days  (Ex-Haridwar)  
Itinerary:  
1.  Day  1 :  Haridwar  –  Barkot  (via  Mussoorie)  
 2.  Day  2 :  Barkot  –  Yamunotri  –  Barkot  
 3.  Day  3 :  Barkot  –  Uttarkashi  
 4.  Day  4 :  Uttarkashi  –  Gangotri  –  Uttarkashi  
 5.  Day  5 :  Uttarkashi  –  Guptkashi  
 6.  Day  6 :  Guptkashi  –  Kedarnath  (via  Gaurikund)  
 7.  Day  7 :  Kedarnath  –  Guptkashi  
 8.  Day  8 :  Guptkashi  –  Pipalkoti  /  Joshimath  
 9.  Day  9 :  Pipalkoti  /  Joshimath  –  Badrinath  –  Mana  –  Pipalkoti  /  Joshimath  
 10.  Day  10 :  Pipalkoti  /  Joshimath  –  Rishikesh  –  Haridwar  (with  adventure  activities)  
 
 
Activities:  
○  Pilgrimage  to  Yamunotri,  Gangotri,  Kedarnath,  and  Badrinath    ○  Sightseeing  in  Mussoorie,  Uttarkashi,  Guptkashi,  Pipalkoti/Joshimath,  and  
Rishikesh
  
 ○  Visit  to  Mana  village    ○  Adventure  activities  in  Rishikesh    
 
Experience  Categories:  Spiritual,  scenic,  and  adventure.  
 
 
Inclusions:  
●  Breakfast  &  Dinner

●  Pickup  &  Drop  
 ●  Sightseeing  in  Private  Vehicle  
 ●  Hotel  accommodation  (same/similar  hotels)  
 ●  Kedarnath  stay  in  dormitory/camp  (No  food  included  here)  
 ●  Registration  
 ●  Toll  tax,  parking,  fuel,  driver  allowances

󰐐
 
Malaysia
 
3N/4D
 
Itinerary
 
Day  1:  Arrival  in  Kuala  Lumpur  
●  Arrival  at  KL  International  Airport  
 ●  Enroute  Putrajaya  Tour  with  a  boat  ride  
 ●  Hotel  check-in  &  leisure  time  
 
Day  2:  Genting  Highlands  +  Batu  Caves  
●  Visit  Batu  Caves  (iconic  Hindu  temple)  
 ●  Head  to  Genting  Highlands:  indoor  theme  park,  shopping,  restaurants  
 ●  Ride  Southeast  Asia’s  longest  gondola  to  the  summit  
 
Day  3:  Kuala  Lumpur  City  Tour  
●  Half-day  tour  covering:  
 ○  Merdeka  Square  
 ○  National  Mosque  &  Sultan  Abdul  Samad  Building  
 ○  Tugu  Negara  (National  Monument)  
 ○  Istana  Negara  (Royal  Palace)  
 ○  Royal  Museum  
 ○  Petronas  Twin  Towers  observation  deck  
 
Day  4:  Departure  
●  Hotel  check-out  
 ●  Transfer  to  airport  for  flight  back  home  
 
OTHERS:  
Accommodation

●  3-star  Hotel:  Metro  Star  /  Howard  Johnson  /  Similar  in  Kuala  Lumpur  
 
Cost  &  Inclusions  
●  ₹18,499  per  person  (based  on  20  pax)  
 ●  Meals:  CP  Plan  (Breakfast  only)  
 ●  Air-conditioned  transfers  
 ●  All  sightseeing  &  tours  as  per  itinerary
